name: ARWorldTrackingConfiguration.EnvironmentTexturing
desc: Options to generate environment textures in a world-tracking AR session.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The framework doesnâ€™t generate environment textures.

items.name: case manual
items.desc: The framework generates environment textures only for probe anchors you explicitly add to the session.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The framework automatically determines when and where to generate environment textures.
